input: Consider the following statements and select the correct answer from the codes given below : Assertion (Q) : No qualifications have been prescribed for the membership of the Union Public Service Commission. Reason (R) : The Constitutions does not fix the number of members of the Union Public Service Commission. Codes :

options.A: Both Q and R are individually true and R is the correct explanation of Q
options.B: Both Q and R are individually true but R is not the correct explanation of Q
options.C: Q is true but R is false
options.D: Q is false but R is true
